name: testrun
description: A module to support a test

scripts.test: jshint index.js lib && lab -v test/format.js test/byplatform.js lib/lab.js && mocha test/mocha.mocha
scripts.coverage: lab -cv test/*.js --coverage-exclude lib/mocha.js && istanbul cover _mocha test/mocha.mocha -x lib/format.js -x lib/byplatform.js -x lib/lab.js
